Meeting Manager is a managerial app available for Android. It uses internet to transcribe speech to text and access the text file. Why Meeting Manager?
1. Meeting minutes in minutes – Enter the details of meeting to be conducted and simply transcribe your meeting conversation to text using Meeting Manager.
2. Ranking of the text – Meeting Manager gives the ranking of the generated text of your meeting conducted along with the meeting details added for your convenience.
If you have any feedback, questions or concerns, please email us at: meeting.manager.app@gmail.com
